hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:Whenever Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) went to answer the call of nature, I along with another boy from us used to go behind him with a tumbler full of water

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ حُمِلَ مَعَهُ الْمَاءُ لِطُهُورِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Getting water carried by somebody else for purification (washing one's private parts).
